channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260105)
item.description:
What's New

feat: improve debug window and add macro auto-space option

  • Clean up debug log messages by removing emojis and icons
  • Display current configuration when debug window opens
  • Add "Add Space After Macro" option for macro expansion
  • Refine forward delete logic for mid-sentence typing
  • Various UI and log formatting improvements

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
